original_text:
“Surely you know how it has been from of old,
    ever since mankind was placed on the earth,
korean_text: 네가 알지 못하느냐 예로부터 사람이 이 세상에 생긴 때로부터

sentences.original_text: Surely you know how it has been from of old
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 당신은 옛날부터 어떠했는지 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: ever since mankind was placed on the earth
